data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pseudotsuga menziesii (Douglas-fir) from sample BOUL-1131
Slope 0 deg, Geology: Gerundeter Granittschutt, av. Tree height 18 m, Tree cover 75%, Shrub cover 50%, Herb cover 75%, Vegatation type: Nass. tiefgr. Do-Flussauenstandort. Grundw. , Film number: 670L
